author: pieterdavid
body:
See the discussion in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/13945 : zero-charge clusters get a NaN position error from the CPE, which leads to a segmentation fault in the reconstruction.
Fixed by changing the value of (HLT)SiStripClusterChargeCutNone from -1 to 0 (it is compared using ">" in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_8_1_X/RecoLocalTracker/SiStripClusterizer/src/ThreeThresholdAlgorithm.cc#L85)
title: SiStripClusterizer: veto zero-charge clusters
